message:
Elementary OS X, oops, Linux Elementary OS, 

http://elementaryos.org/
name: Home | elementary OS
caption: elementaryos.org
description: The next generation of elementary OS is here. Lightweight and beautiful. All-new apps. A refined look. Name your price or download for free.

data.message: Have you used it for development? Or saw (by yourself) someone who did?
Not really, it is still new, but looks promising
It's built on Ubuntu so the same software center it means any application you can install it on Ubuntu is the same software you can install it on it too.
Yes Mohamed Meligy I've seen Emad Elsaid in a video on عرب كاست - Arab Cast writing code on that OS.
Mohamed Meligy Yup, need any particular details ?

Just interested, anything more than a Mac-like UI for Ubuntu? And, any limitations from being an Ubuntu derivative (e.g. some missing tools or malfunctioning feature, etc, how it compares in getting started with compared to, say, Mint)? Thanks
nop, everything running as usual, only new themes, several new programs like (music player, settings, files manager)
Emad Elsaid and if i have my ubuntu already installed is there anyway I can upgrade to Elementary OS? I really like the interface a lot :) good job guys

yup, but results are not guaranteed, several people reported problems doing so.
http://askubuntu.com/questions/379733/minimal-ubuntu-elementary-os-port
You can install the interface it's an interface like Gnome shell.

Here is in details how to install Pantheon on Ubuntu but I advice you to install the distro it self and not the interface on an other distor, Good luck:
http://www.mjma3.com/component/content/category/41.html
